mapper.select: /* com.example.weather.mapper.WeatherMapper.selectRegionData 지역 상세 조회 (단건) */ SELECT ID , REGION_PARENT , REGION_CHILD , NX , NY FROM REGION_TBL WHERE ID = #{id}
/* com.example.weather.mapper.WeatherMapper.selectSeoulList 서울 지역 목록 조회 */ SELECT ID , REGION_PARENT , REGION_CHILD , NX , NY FROM REGION_TBL WHERE REGION_PARENT LIKE CONCAT('서울', '%')
mapper.update: /* com.example.weather.mapper.WeatherMapper.updateWeather 날씨 정보 수정 */ UPDATE REGION_TBL SET TEMP = IFNULL(#{weather.temp}, 0.0) , RAIN_AMOUNT = IFNULL(#{weather.rainAmount}, 0.0) , HUM_ID = IFNULL(#{weather.humid}, 0.0) , LAST_UPDATE_TIME = IFNULL(#{weather.lastUpdateTime}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6)) WHERE ID = #{id}
